primary.context: Caller was having trouble logging into the portal with an invalid account number error
primary.detail: The agent verified the caller and sent a payment link via email and text after the caller confirmed the portal registration link previously sent did not work.

steps: Caller states they cannot log in due to an invalid account number.
Agent performs account lookup and verification.
Agent offers a new registration link, which the caller refuses because they already tried it.
Agent identifies the underlying need is to make a payment.
Agent confirms property and contact details.
Agent sends payment link via text and email.

corrections.note: Caller clarifies previous registration link failed.

actions.detail: Sent link via email and text

insights.summary: The caller initially reported a portal login issue but the agent successfully pivoted to the underlying goal of making a payment. The agent fulfilled the request by sending a payment link after the caller confirmed a previous registration link had failed.
insights.verbatim: I'm trying to get into my account. The account number is wrong.
